name: tdd-game
description: The Ultimate Tester and the Lazy Implementor

scripts.example: ((npm -s run lint example/test.js example/implementation.js && echo "No linter errors!") || echo "You have linter warnings/errors!") && ((./node_modules/.bin/mocha example/test.js && echo "All tests are passing!") || echo "You have failing tests!")
scripts.game: ((npm -s run lint game/test.js game/implementation.js && echo "No linter errors!") || echo "You have linter warnings/errors!") && ((./node_modules/.bin/mocha game/test.js && echo "All tests are passing!") || echo "You have failing tests!")

author: skuttleman@gmail.com
